channel.title: Hmm tricky problem?
channel.description:
Alright here is the issue...
I go to edit drops and npc spawns... Now I don't think npcspawns are the ones affected because i spawned other npcs fine.. anyway whenever I edit npcdrops (atleast) I compile, it compiles perfectly fine no problem... But when I go to run the server I get this issue:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2075) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:117)[/code]
I have now determined I only get this error when I edit DROPS for my npcs.
I've never encountered this type off error... So if anyone could enlighten me a bit about it, I would deeply appreciate it. Thanks.
EDIT2: Also this happened when I added just 1 new drop to the mix...
EDIT here are the things I added to my spawns and my drops: spawns: [code]spawn = 47 3239 9859 0 3238 9857 3237 9869 1 Rat spawn = 47 3238 9863 0 3235 9865 3239 9865 1 Rat spawn = 47 3228 9869 0 3231 item.title: Hmm tricky problem?

item.description:

Alright here is the issue…
